# ReadMe for tidydataset.txt
-------------------------------

This ReadMe is for Getting and Cleaing Data course project2

*How to run the program?*

***

To run the program, execute this in R

1. source("runproject2.R")
2. run_analysis()

You may need to need to load libraries as needed including library(plyr)


*About related files *

***

* A zip file is donwloaded from this site https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip 

* and saved as ./data/dataset.zip in current directory

* After processing the output file is created in the current workign directory as **tidydataset.txt**
